text:
[Verse]
Golden skies above us
Feel the sunlight glow
Whispers of the evening
As the daylight slows

[Verse 2]
Walking on the shoreline
Feet in crystal sand
Waves gently dancing
Hand in loving hand

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams together
Colors paint the sky
Holding you forever
As the night draws nigh

[Bridge]
Stars begin to shimmer
Moon is rising high
Hearts are beating quicker
In the twilight's sigh

[Verse 3]
Nighttime softly whispers
Magic in the air
Lost in sunset dreams
Lost without a care

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams together
Colors paint the sky
Holding you forever
As the night draws nigh
title: Sunset Dreams
